item.title: Zen Mind, Beginners Mind: Book Review
item.description: The Book Zen Mind, Beginner’s Mind by Shunryu Suzuki The Review I first came across the actual term beginner’s mind when reading through the 'http://softwarecraftsmanship.oreilly.com/wiki/wear_the_white_belt[Wear The White Belt]' chapter of Apprenticeship Patterns although it was often mentioned to me on one of the first projects I did at ThoughtWorks a couple of years ago that people liked teaching me things because I just took the information in pretty much without questioning.
